column5: I am headed there next week and I was wondering if there is a good chance of getting a glimpse of a moose or bear?

You want to see bear? go to thevillage dump grounds at night.make sure you stay in your vehicle and have a good spotlight.Moose,take a hike up to one of the hundreds of small lakes in area and check out the shorelines. I used to see them quite regularly in the bays munching water lilies.
